\title{Homework \#1 - Substitution Review}


\author{Alexander Gould, Section 3}

\maketitle
19.$\int\frac{a+bx^{2}}{\sqrt{3ax+bx^{2}}}$

\[
???
\]


20.$\int\frac{z^{2}}{z^{3}+1}dz$

\[
u=z^{3}\quad\frac{1}{3}du=z^{2}dz\qquad\int\frac{1}{3}\frac{du}{u+1}=\frac{1}{3}\int\frac{1}{u+1}du=\frac{\ln(u+1)}{3}=\boxed{\frac{\ln(z^{3}+1)}{3}+C}
\]


24.$\int\sqrt{x}\sin(1+x^{\frac{3}{2}})dx$u

\[
???
\]


26.$\int\frac{dx}{ax+b}\quad\left(a\neq0\right)$

\[
u=ax+b\quad\frac{du}{dx}=a\quad dx=\frac{du}{a}\qquad\int\frac{du}{a}*\frac{1}{u}=\int\frac{1}{a}*\frac{1}{u}du=\frac{1}{a}\int*\frac{1}{u}du=\boxed{\frac{\ln\left(ax+b\right)}{a}+C}
\]


27.$\int(x^{2}+1)(x^{3}+3x)^{4}dx$

\[
u=x^{3}+3x\quad du=3x^{2}+3\qquad\int u^{4}du=4u^{3}=\boxed{4\left(x^{3}+3x\right)^{3}+C}
\]


39.$\int\frac{\sin2x}{1+\cos x^{2}}dx$

\[
???
\]


41.$\int\cot xdx$

\[
\int\frac{\cos x}{\sin x}dx\qquad u=\sin x\quad du=\cos xdx\qquad\int\frac{1}{u}du=\ln u+C=\boxed{\ln\sin x+C}
\]


53.$\int_{0}^{1}\cos\frac{\pi t}{2}dt$

60.$\int_{0}^{1}xe^{-x^{2}}dx$

65.$\int_{0}^{a}x\sqrt{x^{2}+a^{2}}dx\quad\left(a>0\right)$
